name: Invictus Hyperion Fund
description: The Hyperion Fund functions as a syndicated venture capital fund that provides independent investors access to the earliest stages of investing in blockchain projects. Through the IHF token, investors gain diversified exposure to a portfolio of expertly-vetted investments in private and public pre-sales, and ICOs. Invictus analysts leverage proprietary analysis tools (such as the Titan AI tool) to navigate the higher risk characteristic of these early-stage investments.
